title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2054/96 of 25 October 1996 on the publication of the graphic symbol for quality agricultural products specific to the most remote regions and laying down the rules for its reproduction
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2054/96 of 25 October 1996 on the publication of the graphic symbol for quality agricultural products specific to the most remote regions and laying down the rules for its reproduction
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The graphic symbol referred to in Article 20 of Regulation (EEC) No 3763/91, Article 31 of Regulation (EEC) No 1600/92 and Article 26 of Regulation (EEC) No 1601/92 shall be as set out in the Annex.
The graphic symbol shall be reproduced and used in accordance with the technical rules set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following that of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 October 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
